defaultValue: Reload the save and re-build TME structures for settings to take affect during gameplay.

fieldDescription:
This value will be multiplied to the build time of a terraforming or megastructure option.

Fast - 0.5
Normal - 1.0
Slow - 2.0
Custom - Uses the custom build time multiplier settings field

This value will be multiplied to the build cost of a terraforming or megastructure option.

Fast - 0.5
Normal - 1.0
Slow - 2.0
Custom - Uses the custom build time multiplier settings field
